author: Eva Dou
title: China Scrambles to Build Winter-Sports Power in Time for Beijing Games
text:
The last time China hosted an Olympics, the 2008 Summer Games in Beijing, a yearslong push to develop the country’s athletes paid off with a record medal haul.
Now China is ramping up an effort to pull off the same feat for the 2022 Winter Olympics—despite having no winter-sports tradition to draw on. 

Over the past three years, China has...
